T1.text: Turn-in near end of black sign on right
Exit midtrack, eyes to worn white line for T2

T2.text: Worn white line left, not the pit blend line
Straight uphill, left tires near worn white line
Early apex, ride right curb, full trackout

T3.text: Stay right until tire rubber on right curb

T3A.text: Late apex, use flat part of 2-step curb

T4.text: Downhill braking, earlier than feels right
Flagger on right; turn-in just past asphalt patch
Late turn-in, avoid harsh curb, track out full

T5.text: Turn-in about 1 car length past left curb end
Apex at curb, not on it

T6.text: Enter midtrack, drift to very late apex

T7.text: Single apex line, aim for triangle
Use left curb to straighten exit

T7A.text: Access road on right is your reference

T8.text: Flag station straight ahead at T8 entry
Left tires pick up curb early, ride to end

T8A.text: Pick up curb halfway, open wheel before end
If missed, don’t steer to curb
Full throttle once wheel is open

T9A.text: Let car drift right, return left for 10

T10.text: Flagger in wall; sign reference (Toyota A)
Use flat part of 2-step curb, track out full

T11.text: Brake at the dip, stay left
Very late apex, right tires on paint
Early throttle if the exit is clear
